title: kAraNam kETTu vADi
sahitya:
kAraNam kETTu vADi sakhiyE en kAdalan cidambara nAthan innum varAda


anupallavi

  pUraNa dayavuLLa ponnambala durai en porumaiyai shOdikka marai mukham Anadan


caraNam    kallAlum villAlum kaTTi aDittEnO kaNNappan sheidadaik-kanavinilum sheidEnO
 shellAmanaikku tUdu shenru vA enrEnO sheyyAda kAriyam sheyya munninrEnO
